" Aaron Rodgers 's a special athlete," Green Bay coach Mike McCarthy said after the Packers defeated Chicago 21-14 in the NFC championship game. He can do everything you want at the quarterback position. Can make all the throws. Very smart. Has great command of the quarterback position. And he can run.
